name: Lucky Manufacturer
sDescription: Authentication,Admin role,Make Admin,Dashboard,Create and Delete Product,Payment.
description: This is a Manufacturer company based website.In this web site indvidul roles for admin and user.User can visit service page after login.And also can order for a product .After oder user need to pay for this product.Stripe payment system used in this website.After successfully payment user get a transtion id.In this website user and admin has indivisul dashboard.User see order and can also delete unpaid orders.And can send a review.Admin dashboard show manage product where admin can delete any product.There is another option add product where admin can add new items.There is another option make admin where admin can make admin from users .Firebase authentication system implements in this web site so user can log in with google and also email password.Mongo Db used in this website
technology: -React -Daisy Ui -React Router -React Query -React Hooks Form -React Icons -React Toastify -Axios -Stripe -Firebase -Heroku -Mongo Db

name: Fitness Studio
sDescription: Authentication ,Dashboard,See all service, Order and remove service,Delete service.
description: This is a service provider system based website.user can see services with out login.But for order a service user has to log in.After Order user can checkout.Firebase authentication system implement in this so user can sign up with valid email password.And user have to log in  with sign up gmail.
technology: -React -React Router -React Bootstrap -React Icons -React Toastify  -React Hooks Form -Firebase

name: Car Inventory
sDescription: Authentication ,See all service,Checkout, Order and remove service,Delete service.
description: This is a warehouse system based website.there is a inventory page where show all products they provide.User can update the quantity of this product.There is a page My Items where show log in users added items.And user can delete Items.there is a Mange Inventory page where admin can delete any users added items.there is a Add item page where user can add a new item.Firebase authentication system used in this website so user can log in with google and also email password.Mongo DB used in this website
technology: -React -React Router -React Bootstrap -React Icons -React Toastify -Axios -React Hooks Form -Firebase -Heroku -Mongo Db
